mindstorms.title: {legoMindstormsRegisteredTrademark} bricks
mindstorms.intro: {appName} does not currently support previous generations of {legoMindstormsRegisteredTrademark}.
mindstorms.help: But with your help, it can! Click the {icon} icon in the top right to see how you can support us.
mindstorms.rcx: RCX: Might work in streaming mode.
mindstorms.nxt: NXT: We have tested this. It could work!
mindstorms.ev3: EV3: Supported using Visual Studio Code.

poweredUp.title: Other hubs
poweredUp.intro: Support for these hubs is currently not planned.

customFirmwareDropzone.label: Drop custom firmware .zip file here or click to browse.

licenseText.error: There was a problem while getting the firmware file.

acceptCheckbox.label: I have read and agree to the license terms and conditions.

hubName.label: Hub name
hubName.help: Enter a name here to customize the hub name when flashing the firmware. This name will be used in the Bluetooth advertising data and can be used to identify the hub when connecting.
